translation.es: Alquilaremos la planta baja,ya que es zona comercial,

translation.en: -and get a tenant for the second floor. -But can't I afford...
translation.es: - y la segunda planta.- Pero no puedo...

translation.en: Income from the rentals will cover the property taxes,
you can live on the top two floors.
translation.es: y tienes los dos pisos de arriba.

translation.en: Everything else you can have. Let me just...
translation.es: Todo lo demás es tuyo. Permíteme...

translation.en: -Hello? -They won't seat me without you.
translation.es: - ¿Hola?- No me dan mesa sin ti.

translation.en: -Where are you? -I'm standing outside the place.
-You're 45 minutes early. -There are many available tables.
translation.es: - Faltan 45 minutos.- Hay muchas mesas libres.

translation.en: -The guy was a jerk. -We have a reservation.
translation.es: - El tipo fue grosero.- Tenemos reserva.

translation.en: -Did you say my name? -I said my name.
-Let me finish up, we'll figure it out. -How long are you gonna be?
I'll be there at one when we said we'd meet.
Hurry up. Parking was easier than I anticipated.
Okay, I'll see you soon.
We won't do the pool now.
-I think that's the right decision. -Everything okay?
Totally. Lunch with my father.
Say no more.
No, now it's easy.
When I was younger, I was so invested in his grievances,
translation.es: Antes me importaban tanto sus penas,

translation.en: his anger at the world, they were mine, too,
translation.es: su enojo con el mundo,que eran míos también.

translation.en: but now that I live 3,000 miles away and have my own kid, a thriving business,
translation.es: Ahora que vivo a 1500 kmy tengo a mi hijo y mi empresa exitosa,

translation.en: I don't even get angry at him anymore.
translation.es: ya ni me enojo con él.

translation.en: It's even just funny, you know...
Sorry, I don't know why I'm suddenly...
I think it's all this plaster dust and coffee.
translation.es: Será el polvo de yeso y el café.

translation.en: -Do you need something? -Like what?
Let's see. One brings you up and the other brings you down,
translation.es: Veamos. Uno te levanta y el otro te calma,

translation.en: but I'm not certain which is which.
translation.es: pero no sé bien cuál es cuál.

translation.en: Do you have a guess?
-I haven't worn these pants in a while. -I don't...
translation.es: - Hacía mucho no usaba este pantalón.- No...

translation.en: Take both.
Thanks, Matt.
I don't have anyone in my life like you.
translation.es: No tengo a nadie como tú.

translation.en: -There's my son. -Hey.
These are yours. They were in the upstairs room.
Maureen is throwing things out. I wanted you to have them.
translation.es: Maureen está tirando cosas. Quise dártelo.

translation.en: Thanks.
-The Vuarnets are Danny's. -He said they were yours.
translation.es: - Los Vuarnets son de Danny.- Dijo que eran tuyos.

translation.en: -No, you can throw them out. -They're quite fancy.
Maybe Maureen will use them.
-What happened to your face? -We got a dog. Did I tell you?
translation.es: - ¿Qué te pasó en la cara?- Tenemos perro, ¿te dije?

translation.en: -Maybe. -Bruno, my charge, we call him Bruno.
Named for the idiot in Werner Herzog's Stroszek.
translation.es: Por el idiota de Stroszek, de Herzog.

translation.en: -Never seen it. -Really?
I own a cassette at home, if you wanna come over.
translation.es: La tengo en video en casasi quieres venir.

translation.en: So, what happened?
Oh, he lunged for a deranged hare, taking me in the process.
translation.es: Se lanzó sobre una liebrey me derribó a mí.

translation.en: -You should see the other dog. -You all right?
translation.es: - Debiste ver al otro perro.- ¿Estás bien?

translation.en: I'm fine. He didn't mean it. It wasn't his fault.
translation.es: Sí. Fue sin querer. No fue su culpa.

translation.en: -Shall we go in? -I'm not eating here.
-Because they wouldn't seat you? -The guy was very obnoxious.
translation.es: - ¿Porque no te dieron mesa?- Fue muy grosero.

translation.en: -Let me talk to him. -No, let's go somewhere else.
translation.es: - Hablaré con él.- No, vamos a otro lado.

translation.en: -I only have an hour and a half. -It's my protest, like McEnroe.
translation.es: - Solo tengo una hora y media.- Es mi protesta, como McEnroe.

translation.en: Okay, let me think.
Not too far, because at three, I have to put money in the meter.
translation.es: No muy lejos, que debo poner dineroen el parquímetro.

translation.en: -This man is treading right on my heels. -No, Dad, he's with me.
translation.es: - Este me pisa los talones.- Está conmigo.

translation.en: This is Gabe. He works at my firm in New York.
translation.es: Es Gabe. Trabaja en mi empresa.

translation.en: Nice to meet you, Mr. Meyerowitz.
I thought Gabe could join us for part of lunch.
-His specialty is in estate planning. -I have an accountant.
I had a chance to review some of the documents...
Barry Sukenick doesn't work on this scale,
translation.es: Barry Sukenick no trabaja a esta escala,

translation.en: and as we move toward selling the house,
translation.es: y como vamos a vender, sería bueno

translation.en: it might be a good time to get some affairs in order.
If we sell the house, it'll be my decision.
-Pardon me. -Brian and James, who you met...
Very charming interracial homosexual couple, and smart about the work.
translation.es: Encantadora pareja homosexual interracial,y saben de arte.

translation.en: They were familiar with "Gilded Halfwing."
Yes, James says they like the work very much, and they love the house,
translation.es: Sí, James dice que les gusta tu obra,y les encantó la casa,

translation.en: and they made us an offer.
For the work, too?
For the work, the house, some of the furniture.
translation.es: Por las obras, la casa y algunos muebles.

translation.en: -Your brother doesn't want to sell. -Brother?
Half-brother, we have a different mother. That's a real shame for him, then.
translation.es: Medio hermano. Distinta madre.Qué pena por él.

translation.en: Danny stands the most to benefit. He doesn't work.
translation.es: Danny es el que más se beneficiará.No trabaja.

translation.en: -He and Karen have separated. -Really?
I took him in, but now he's with Jean in Rochester.
translation.es: Lo alojé en casa,pero ahora está con Jean.

translation.en: -Shit. -Apparently, his mother moved to Florida,
translation.es: - Mierda.- Su madre se mudó a Florida.

translation.en: which I didn't know. Did you?
-No. -She's still angry with me, apparently.
translation.es: - No.- Parece que sigue enojada conmigo.

translation.en: Your brother and sister helped organize a show for me up at Bard.
translation.es: Tus hermanos ayudaron a organizarmeuna exhibición en Bard.

translation.en: -A retrospective? -A retrospective of the faculty, yes.
Like a... group show.
-I'll just sit here. -There's other artists,
but I was promised a very prominent place in the gallery.
translation.es: pero me prometieronun lugar destacado en la galería.

translation.en: Sounds good, congratulations.
You purchased the property in 1973 for $60,000,
but since you borrowed against the house a couple times,
translation.es: pero la usó de garantía algunas veces.

translation.en: the net proceeds have diminished.
Danny thinks that after the show,
my work could appreciate considerably in value and that we should wait.
translation.es: apreciaría mi trabajo,y que deberíamos esperar.

translation.en: You just told me Danny doesn't want to sell at all.
Dad, whatever happens at Bard, you can't afford the real estate taxes.
translation.es: Papá, no puedes pagar los impuestos.

translation.en: You're paying two grand a month in utilities.
Things you wouldn't think: housekeepers...
Mercedes has been with us for years,
and though I deplore her politics, I'm not letting her go.
translation.es: y aunque deploro su ideología,no voy a despedirla.

translation.en: -I'm giving examples. -Am I paying for him?
No, he's doing this as a favor. Gabe's specialty is not my specialty.
translation.es: No, lo hace de favor.Mi especialidad es otra.

translation.en: -I'm in personal wealth. -Something I wouldn't know about.
translation.es: - Patrimonio personal.- Lo cual me es ajeno.

translation.en: -Gabe would only get paid when we sell. -I'm not giving Gabe anything.
translation.es: - Gabe cobraría al vender.- No voy a pagarle.

translation.en: Absolutely not. And I'm not having this conversation with him.
translation.es: De ninguna manera.Y no conversaré esto con él.

translation.en: -This is a private family matter. -Okay, I understand.
Normally, conspiracy is mounted by people close to you.
translation.es: Las conspiraciones son de gente cercana.

translation.en: I don't even know this asshole.
translation.es: A este idiota ni lo conozco.

translation.en: -Can we get a check? -We didn't order anything.
-I wanted to punch Gabe right in the nose. -The owner is a client.
translation.es: - Habría golpeado a Gabe.- El dueño es cliente.

translation.en: That's why we could get the table so last minute.
translation.es: Por eso nos dio mesa sin reserva.

translation.en: That's why they gave us this bigger table.
translation.es: Y nos dieron esta, más grande.

translation.en: I imagine they'll send some complementary stuff, too.
Is that baby aspirin?
-Adult aspirin bothers my stomach. -Are you okay?
translation.es: - Las de adulto me caen mal.- ¿Estás bien?

translation.en: -I've had some headaches, it's fine. -Have you gone to a doctor?
translation.es: - Solo dolor de cabeza.- ¿Fuiste al médico?

translation.en: It's not necessary.
You're so important you need two phones.
translation.es: Eres tan importanteque precisas dos teléfonos.

translation.en: L.J. has a show at MoMA, thought I'd check it out.
translation.es: L. J. está en el MoMA. Pensé en pasar.

translation.en: I was at the opening. I met Sigourney Weaver.
translation.es: Fui a la inauguración.Conocí a Sigourney Weaver.

translation.en: -How is L.J.? -We chatted.
She said to me, "My name is Sigourney." I said, "My name is Harold."
translation.es: Me dijo: "Hola, soy Sigourney".Y yo dije: "Hola, soy Harold".

translation.en: L.J. says he's gonna try to come to the show at Bard.
translation.es: L. J. dijo que intentará ira la exhibición de Bard.

translation.en: -That's great. -I'm sure he'd like to see you there.
Yeah, if I'm in town.
I think I'm gonna show one of the bronzes.
translation.es: Quizá muestre uno de los bronces.

translation.en: It's an early piece I made when you used to sit on the floor and watch me work.
translation.es: Es una pieza de cuando te sentabasa verme trabajar.

translation.en: You remember that?
You've told me this before, and I don't remember it.
translation.es: Ya me lo habías dicho. No lo recuerdo.

translation.en: You'd hand me tools and make suggestions as if you, too, were the artist.
translation.es: Me dabas las cosas y hacías sugerencias.Parecías otro artista.

translation.en: Well, I wasn't.
It was originally untitled, but I'm gonna call it "Matthew."
translation.es: No tenía título, pero le pondré "Matthew".

translation.en: I'd like to see Eliza, too.
She sent me her movie, which I thought was really good. Did you like it?
translation.es: Me envió su película.Me pareció muy buena. ¿Te gustó?

translation.en: At that time, I thought you might be interested in sculpture,
translation.es: En esa época,creía que te interesaría la escultura

translation.en: or maybe an actor or a comic.
translation.es: o que serías actor o cómico.

translation.en: You were a very talented mimic.
I do the voices of a lot of my coworkers, which cracks people up at the firm.
translation.es: Hago las voces de mis compañerosy se mueren de risa en la oficina.

translation.en: "I'm gonna run downstairs for an e-smoke."
You don't know...
You don't know Ezra, but that's a pretty good imitation.
translation.es: No conoces a Ezra,pero lo hago bastante bien.

translation.en: You were also very musical, like Danny.
translation.es: Y eras muy musical, como Danny.

translation.en: -But Danny could really play. -No, that's true.
translation.es: - Pero Danny tocaba en serio.- Es verdad.

translation.en: He was quite gifted. I don't know why he didn't pursue it.
translation.es: Tenía talento. No sé por qué no siguió.

translation.en: I know he raised a child, but in this day and age, it's possible to do both.
translation.es: Crio a una hija,pero hoy se pueden hacer las dos cosas.

translation.en: So many other things factor in, don't you think?
I thought you'd do something artistic.
I work with artists. I understand the temperament.
Maybe Eliza will be my heir in that department.
Although, she seems more commercially-minded,
translation.es: Aunque parece más orientada a lo comercial

translation.en: and potentially a lesbian.
Really? I didn't get that.
I think I mentioned to you I left the company I was with.
translation.es: Creo que te dijeque dejé la empresa en la que estaba.

translation.en: Me and a couple of other people started our own firm.
translation.es: Lancé mi empresa con un par de socios.

translation.en: It was scary and a big change, but things have settled and we're doing really well.
translation.es: Fue un gran cambio, tuve miedo,pero las cosas van muy bien.

translation.en: -Maureen is talking to a friend... -A lot of old clients came with us.
translation.es: - Maureen busca...- Muchos clientes se pasaron.

translation.en: ...about getting someone to come and review the show.
-I think we're... -I've been ignored by the Times.
We're a great alternative to some of the bigger firms.
-This might put me back on the map. -This is our logo.
Fifty-five dollars for a steak?
-They're known for their meat. -And $35 for salmon?
translation.es: - Son famosos por su carne.- ¿Y 35 por el salmón?

translation.en: Do you get the salmon to blow you for that price?
translation.es: ¿Te la chupa el salmón por ese precio?

translation.en: -Do you want to split a salmon? -I'm gonna get my own steak.
-A whole portion is too much for me. -Eat what you can.
translation.es: - Una porción es mucho para mí.- Come lo que puedas.

translation.en: -I'll have a starter. -I'm paying.
Have you dined with us before? Do you have any questions?
We have answers. I'll have a salad...
-The Little Gem, okay. -...to start, and then I'll have a steak.
translation.es: - La Pequeña Gema.- ...y luego un bistec.

translation.en: -The six ounce or the twelve? -Twelve, and maybe spinach for the table.
translation.es: - ¿El de 170 o 240 gramos?- El de 240, y espinaca.

translation.en: -The potatoes sound good. -Sure.
translation.es: - Las papas se ven bien.- Bueno.

translation.en: And... shall we get a wine?
Live it up.
And maybe... this Brunello.
That's one of my favorites.
I'll have the steak and the market salad.
translation.es: Yo quiero el bistec y la ensalada.

translation.en: We don't have a ton of time, so bring everything at once.
translation.es: Tenemos poco tiempo. Trae todo junto.

translation.en: Of course.
How's my grandson who I never get to see?
translation.es: ¿Cómo está mi nieto a quien nunca veo?

translation.en: Here.
He's quite handsome. His hair's so blond.
No, that's his friend Sebastian.
translation.es: No, ese es su amigo, Sebastian.

translation.en: He's the one with his hand in his trousers.
translation.es: Es el de la mano en el pantalón.

translation.en: He's tucking in his shirt.
He looks like the child in Kubrick's The Shining.
translation.es: Se parece al de El resplandor.

translation.en: It's the sweater, I think.
Handsome boy, has the Meyerowitz eyes. Does he like the Knicks?
translation.es: Guapo. Los ojos Meyerowitz.¿Le gustan los Knicks?

translation.en: I suppose he'll be a Lakers fan
since you're essentially an Angeleno at this point.
translation.es: Tú ya eres casi de Los Ángeles.

translation.en: It's hard to have a relationship and a child.
translation.es: Es difícil tener una relación y un hijo.

translation.en: -I imagine you felt that, too. -No.
Not really. I didn't find that difficult.
-You've been married four times. -Three, the first one was annulled.
translation.es: - Te casaste cuatro veces.- Tres. El primero se anuló.

translation.en: I married her because of Tony, but I think about what it would mean to leave,
translation.es: Me casé con ella por Tony,pero pienso en separarme,

translation.en: but even contemplating it makes me feel guilty.
translation.es: aunque solo contemplarlo me da culpa.

translation.en: I haven't met his mother, so I can't advise you in that department.
translation.es: No conozco a su madre.No puedo asesorarte.

translation.en: You could've if you'd come to our wedding.
translation.es: La habrías conocido en la boda.

translation.en: You did it in L.A.
I didn't invite a lot of people, but everyone I invited,
translation.es: No invité a muchos, pero todos vinieron,

translation.en: including Mom, came except for you.
-So brazen. -What?
This jerk just put his glasses on our table.
translation.es: Puso sus lentes en nuestra mesa.

translation.en: -I don't think he realizes... -Oh, no. He knows exactly what he's doing.
translation.es: - No se dio cuenta...- Claro que sí.

translation.en: Dad, in terms of your estate,
I don't want you making mistakes that could be avoided.
translation.es: no quiero errores que puedan evitarse.

translation.en: Then they will be my mistakes.
We'll have this decanted.
Very nice. Before she dried out, Maureen drank half my wine cellar,
translation.es: Bien. Antes de dejarlo,Maureen se tomó media bodega.

translation.en: so I haven't had any good wine in a while.
translation.es: Hace tiempo que no bebo vino bueno.

translation.en: But she's been sober for six weeks.
-Is she still going to A.A.? -She's doing it her own way.
translation.es: - ¿Sigue yendo a AA?- Lo hace a su modo.

translation.en: Maureen is made uncomfortable by A.A., which I can understand.
translation.es: AA la pone incómoda, es comprensible.

translation.en: It's quite infantilizing, giving away your control like that.
translation.es: Te infantiliza entregar el control así.

translation.en: I think that's the idea.
I tell Maureen, "I don't like you when you drink. You become a different person."
translation.es: Yo le digo:"No me gustas cuando bebes. Eres otra".

translation.en: -Does it look like we need two ketchups? -What are you talking about?
The son-of-a-bitch just put his ketchup on our table.
translation.es: Puso su kétchup en nuestra mesa.

translation.en: Before you know it, he'll be sitting in my lap.
translation.es: Pronto estará sentado en mi falda.

translation.en: -I'm gonna punch this guy in the nose. -It's fine. We have the bigger table.
translation.es: - Voy a golpearlo.- Nuestra mesa es más grande.

translation.en: Dad, what the fuck?
-Please don't do that again. -It's my protest.
translation.es: - No vuelvas a hacerlo.- Es mi protesta.

translation.en: You better hope he doesn't have a cold.
They're leaving. Can you relax now? I'd like to relax now.
translation.es: Se van. ¿Puedes relajarte ya?Yo quiero relajarme.

translation.en: So brazen.
I think the Knicks might be interesting this year.
translation.es: Los Knickspueden tener un año interesante.

translation.en: Wait a minute.
Wait a minute, where's my jacket?
-Next to you. -This isn't my jacket.
translation.es: - A tu lado.- No es este.

translation.en: -That son of a bitch took my jacket. -What do you mean?
translation.es: - El hijo de puta se lo llevó.- ¿Qué?

translation.en: -He has my jacket. -He's still outside. I'll get it back.
translation.es: - Tiene mi saco.- Está ahí. Iré a buscarlo.

translation.en: Shit, it's 3:00. I have to put money in the meter.
-Forget it. -I'm not getting a ticket.
Fuck it. I'm gonna grab the guy, you get the check.
translation.es: Mierda. Iré por el tipo, tú paga.

translation.en: I thought you were paying. I wouldn't have ordered wine.
translation.es: Creí que tú pagabas.No habría pedido vino.

translation.en: -Well, what do you want me to do? -Where's our waiter? Excuse me!
translation.es: - ¿Qué quieres que haga?- ¿Dónde está el camarero? ¡Disculpe!

translation.en: Dad!
Excuse me!
Excuse me! Excuse me! Excuse me!
-What? -Sorry, I think there was a mix-up.
-You seem to have taken my dad's jacket. -What?
translation.es: - Tienes el saco de mi papá.- ¿Qué?

translation.en: You have his jacket. We have yours.
translation.es: Tienes su saco. Y él el tuyo.

translation.en: -It's on its way. -This is my jacket, man.
I think it isn't. Just wait till he gets here.
translation.es: Creo que no. Espera a que llegue.

translation.en: -I know what jacket I took. -I understand, but you took the wrong one.
translation.es: - Sé qué saco tomé.- Entiendo, pero es otro.

translation.en: -You crazy, man. -Listen, just wait a second, okay?
translation.es: - Estás loco.- Espera un segundo, por favor.

translation.en: Jesus, what does it cost you? Where you got to be?
translation.es: Cielos, ¿qué te cuesta?¿Adónde tienes que ir?

translation.en: -Where's he going? -Just hang on. Hey, turn around.
-You want to get hit, man? -What is your problem?
Can't you see? You have my father's jacket, he has yours.
translation.es: ¿No lo ves?Tienes el saco de mi papá y él el tuyo.

translation.en: What's the fucking problem? Dad, give him his jacket.
translation.es: ¿Cuál es tu puto problema?Papá, dale su saco.

translation.en: -What is that? -It's a ticket stub
for something called Fault in Our Stars.
-I don't know that. -Of course you do.
It has the kids dying of cancer. It was a big hit.
translation.es: La de los chicos con cáncer. Un éxito.

translation.en: I've seen it.
-When did you see Fault in Our Stars? -In the country at the triplex.
translation.es: - ¿Cuándo la viste?- En el cine del campo.

translation.en: It was quite affecting.
Those kids were tremendously winning.
Dad, how would he have your ticket stub to Fault in Our Stars in his jacket?
translation.es: ¿Y por qué él tendría tu boletopara Bajo la misma estrella?

translation.en: -No ticket, stroke of luck. -That guy was a real asshole.
translation.es: - No hay multa. Qué suerte.- Qué imbécil ese tipo.

translation.en: -He was. We never really had our lunch. -Fucking tourist.
translation.es: - Sí. No pudimos almorzar.- Puto turista.

translation.en: Should've said something more cutting. I let him get away with being a prick.
translation.es: Debí decir algo más duro.Fue un idiota y yo lo dejé.

translation.en: -It's gonna eat at me. -Sure you don't wanna come to the house?
translation.es: - Me va a molestar todo el día.- ¿Seguro no vienes?

translation.en: -Maureen was gonna make pigeon. -No, I have to go, Dad.
Where are you going?
I'm going over to Mom's.
-Maybe I'll go with you. -I don't know if that's...
translation.es: - Podría ir contigo.- No sé si...

translation.en: That was the summer on Martha's Vineyard
translation.es: Fue el verano en Martha's Vineyard

translation.en: -with L.J., Maya, Paul and Lori. -We were staying at the Knapp house,
translation.es: - con L. J., Maya, Paul y Laurie.- Fuimos al Knapp,

translation.en: -the one with that peculiar blind dog. -Yeah.
And Matthew, you were making up all of these card games, you remember?
translation.es: Y, Matthew, tú inventabasjuegos de cartas, ¿recuerdas?

translation.en: And there was one in particular where I asked if it was based on luck,
translation.es: De uno te preguntési era cuestión de suerte y tú dijiste:

translation.en: and you said it was based on hope.
You hoped you got a good card.
And that's what we said all summer, remember? "It's based on hope."
translation.es: Lo repetimos todo el verano:"Es cuestión de esperanza".

translation.en: I was commissioned to make "Gilded Halfwing" that summer.
L.J. was very jealous. I had already sold a piece to the Whitney.
translation.es: L. J. me envidiaba.Yo le había vendido una obra al Whitney.

translation.en: -Where do they keep that piece? -It's not lost. They catalog these things.
translation.es: - ¿Dónde la tienen?- No se perdió. Está todo catalogado.

translation.en: -I didn't say it was. -Harold, did you see?
translation.es: - No dije que estuviera pedida.- ¿Viste, Harold?

translation.en: You still have one of the sketches of "Gilded Halfwing."
translation.es: Aún tienes uno de los bocetosde "Media ala dorada".

translation.en: -It looks good here. -Yeah, Cody really admires it.
translation.es: - Se ve bien aquí.- A Cody le gusta mucho.

translation.en: -He says it gives him ideas. -I thought Cody was a gym teacher.
translation.es: - Dice que le da ideas.- ¿No era profesor de gimnasia?

translation.en: No, he taught Spanish at P.S. 182 and coached the soccer team.
translation.es: No, enseñaba español en la 182y entrenaba al equipo de fútbol.

translation.en: Matthew, Cody's sons are coming for dinner. I'm making a meatloaf.
translation.es: Los hijos de Cody vienen a cenar.Haré pan de carne.

translation.en: Okay, good, I'm starving.
I told Matthew this seems like an elaborate ruse
translation.es: Le dije a Matthewque parece una estrategia

translation.en: just to get his parents back together.
You didn't tell me that.
This is Tony on FaceTime. You mind if I...?
Harold, do you want coffee, or a tea, or anything?
-He has to go! -Tea would be nice.
I can't have coffee after four.
translation.es: Nada de café después de las 4.
